sentences.sContent: She sat silently,flinging the odd word into the conversation from time to time.
sentences.sCn: 她静静地坐着听谈话，不时插进一两句。

sentences.sContent: People from the church would come by my trailer from time to time to tell me they were still praying for me, and that they hoped I would come back to Jesus before I wound up in hell.
sentences.sCn: 教会的人时不时会到我的拖车上来，告诉我他们依然在为我祈祷，希望我不要在去往地狱的道路上越走越远，早日回到耶稣我主的身边。
